leadingComments.value: Cleanup existing polling interval when component is destroyed.

*
         * @name setPollingInterval
         * @param {Function} callback A function to be executed in defined interval.
         * @param {Integer} interval Time in milliseconds between the executions.
         * @param {Boolean} randomize Whether to randomize the interval (±1000 milliseconds). Useful to prevent
         * congestions.
         * @description
         *   Sets up the polling interval which will execute supplied callback function in the defined interval.
         *   In case the polling is already set up, the method will not do anything.

*
         * @name clearPollingInterval
         * @description
         *   Clears up the polling interval. In case the polling wasn't already set up, the method will not do anything.
